mocafe.angie

This subpackage contains all the modules to simulate an angiogenesis model in FEniCS, using an hybrid Phase-Field/agent approach. By default, the algorithms used are the same presented by Travasso and collaborators [TPoireC+11].

It is composed of the following modules:

  • af_sourcing, which contains classes and methods to manage source cells.

  • forms, which contains the implementation in Unified Form Language (UFL) of the PDEs presented in Travasso et al. [TPoireC+11].

  • tipcells, which contains the classes and modules to manage tip cells.

  • base_classes, which contains classes and methods shared among the angie modules.

You can find full documentation for each module in the “Submodules” section below.

Submodules

  • mocafe.angie.af_sourcing
  • mocafe.angie.base_classes
  • mocafe.angie.forms
  • mocafe.angie.tipcells
